page.title: 01STANTON BY DALE.
page.content: THE{SCHOOL}IN STANTON-BY-DALE WAS BUILT IN 1853.IT HAS A LARGE SLOPING ROOF.INSIDE THERE IS NO CENTRAL HEATING EVEN THOUGH THE SCHOOLS FIVE CLASSROOMS ARE LARGE.THE HOUSES AROUND STANTON-BY-DALE ARE QUITE OLD AS SOME HAVE FOOT SCRAPERS,ALSO THE VILLAGE HALL IS MADE FROM SANDSTONE AND IS QUITE OLD. OUTSIDE THE{PUBLIC HOUSE}CALLED THE STANHOPE ARMS THERE IS THE COAT OF ARMS OF THE VILLAGE.BEHIND THE STANHOPE ARMS THERE IS AN OLD QUARRY WHICH IS NOW A LARGE GARDEN. THE{ALMS HOUSES}WERE BUILT IN 1711 BY JOSEPH MIDDLEMORES WIFE AND BY 1735 THEY HAD AN EXTENSION BUILT.ONCE AGAIN IN 1904 IT WAS ADDED TO ,BUT AFTER, THE EIGHT HOUSES WERE MADE INTO EIGHT.TODAY THE HOUSES ARE STILL USED AND OLD PEOPLE STILL LIVE IN THEM.
